name: Illustration
description:
Here I can generally draw whatever you want! Except, if it is a comic or a set of emotes or stickers, please refer to their pages for the pricing.

 The base price for illustration is as followed:

 **Half Body & Flat Color**: 20USD

 **Full Body & Flat Color**: 25USD

 **Half Body & Full CG**: 30USD

 **Full Body & Full CG**: 35USD

 Grayscale is considered as Flat Color.

 Chibi is considered as Half Body.

 Each additional character costs at least 10USD.

 Simple background is free, but more complex background costs at least 10USD.

 I may charge you additionally for complex details.

pricing_examples.description:
**Base half body flat color price**: 20USD

 **2 Extra Characters**: 10USD each

 **Total**: 40USD

**Base full body flat color price**: 25USD

 **3 Extra characters**: 10USD each

 **Simple background**: Free

 **Total**: 55USD

**Base half body full color price**: 30USD

 **1 Extra Character**: 10USD each

 **Complex background**: 40USD

 **Total**: 80USD

**Base full body full color price**: 35USD
 **1 Extra Character**: 10USD each (Goat)

 **Complext background**: 10USD (Paint over photo)

 **Total**: 55USD

name: Comic
description:
I can draw a comic as well! You may have seen some on my Twitter here and there. The pricing for this type of commission is a bit difficult to calculate though because in addition to the drawing process, it might take a long time to settle on a draft. I will also charge additionally depending on the complexity as well. I am really sorry I can't say the exact range because there are so many factors.

 **Base grayscale comic price**: 50USD

 **Base color comic price**: 70USD

 **Max no. of pages**: 3

name: Emotes/Stickers
description:
And lastly, I can help design and draw emotes! (And yes, applied to Discord stickers as well). There is no minimum or maximum number to commission, but I recommend commissioning in a batch of 5-10. And as always, there might be additional charges for complexity.

**Base price per emote**: 5USD

 Also thank you Rosa for allowing me to put your commission in my portfolio!
